location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 73 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses letters sent and received and recent comings and goings from Bushire. Confirms departure of Beaumont to India and gives thanks to Latouche for his congratulations. An additional note added on 9 January 1781 reports the arrival of Mr Robert Holford and discusses other administrative matters.
